title: LA Confidential
content:
Hi everyone trying to identify the main titles for L.A. Confidential. lil help?

My first guess was futura but the C is very not futura (though it could be hand drawn)

[http://i31.tinypic.com/2ltrfdl.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20080310191041/http:/i31.tinypic.com/2ltrfdl.png "http://i31.tinypic.com/2ltrfdl.png")

 [‹ 45royale](http://web.archive.org/web/20080310191041/http:/typophile.com/node/42958 "Go to previous forum topic") [can anybody help? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080310191041/http:/typophile.com/node/42954 "Go to next forum topic")
author: creatif

comments.content:
bump,

as this is the only time it’s taken tyophilers more than a few hours to identify a font i’m inclined to believe i’m handling this incorrectly. but i’ll try one more time.

It looks similar to the old Filmotype “E” series, but some of the details don’t match.

(I’m part of a group who is digitizing the old Filmotype fonts, but only a couple of them have been released so far. We haven’t even started on the “E” series yet.)

[Block Gothic Extra Condensed](http://web.archive.org/web/20080310191041/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/red_rooster/block_gothic_extra_condensed/?sample_text=L.A.%20Confidential) might be pretty close once you slant it.

- Mike Yanega
